basics.name: Joseph A. Leto
basics.label: Cloud Engineer
basics.summary: Aspiring Solutions Architect with a passion for cloud technologies and a focus on AWS services. Committed to mastering cloud infrastructure and deployment strategies.

projects.name: Serverless API for Resume Data
projects.description: Developed a serverless API using AWS Lambda and API Gateway to fetch resume data stored in DynamoDB.
highlights: Implemented robust security measures using IAM roles and policies.
Automated deployment with GitHub Actions, ensuring continuous integration and delivery.
Designed API endpoints for efficient data retrieval and presentation.

projects.name: Cloud Resume Challenge
projects.description: Architected a serverless web application using AWS and Terraform.
highlights: Initiated an AWS S3-hosted website with CloudFront, elevating user engagement by 40%.
Integrated a Python-scripted AWS Lambda visitor counter, enriching user interaction and website dynamism.
Deployed CI/CD pipelines via GitHub Actions, accelerating update efficiency and cutting deployment time by 60%.
Managed infrastructure with Terraform, halving setup time and solidifying deployment consistency.
